channel.title: F2p Merlock Remake
channel.description:
[b][font=georgia][size=18pt]Merlock Adventures f2p style[/size][/font][/b] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/13ztipv.jpg[/img]
[font=georgia][b] [i]~:Merlock Diary:~[/i][/b][/font]
I miss those F2p days back in edgeville and varrock Multi pking and the economy was fantastic in varrock. And the cows in Lumbridge... Well im going to gradually Bring back that time for good, im going to create ..from blank using 317 deob client , an stable great economy multi fusion f2p server taking care and time in this and have perfect development team Merlock will have every f2p quest and skill and combat train exactly same as the old days. So LETS BRING IT BACK!

item.title: F2p Merlock Remake

[/quote]

Merlock will hav every f2p quest

OT: Fix your grammar xD[/quote]

that are spelling error, not be grammar.
